title: Judgement Day
lyrics:
All my life I've wasted so much time
Now I stand before you
A witness of the truth
Let the truth be told
Save my soul



It's gonna be alright

Wash your sins away

Alright

Come judgment day

It'll be alright

Brother so they say

Alright

Come Judgment day



Go on lay your judgment on me

Do you practice what you preach

When you stand before your maker

Hope you have a soul for him to keep

Time will tell

I wish you well



Alright

Wash your sins away

Alright

Come Judgment Day

It's gonna be alright

Brother they say

It'll be alright

Come Judgment Day



It's gonna be alright

Wash your sins away

Alright

Come Judgment Day

It'll be alright

Brother so they say

Alright
